name: Mark Dean: Inventor of the PC Age
name_original: Mark Dean: Inventor of the PC Age
description:
Made as a submission to Black History Month Jam 2021. This is my 3rd game jam! 

Introduction:

Who is Mark Dean?  Mark Dean invented key technologies that went into the very first personal computer. His inventions include the color PC monitor, the Industry Standard Architecture (ISA) system bus, and he went on to lead the team who created the first gigahertz chip! Without him, computers would be vastly different than they are today!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Enter: Start Game
  • Z: Progress Text

Credits:

  • PACMAN stuff/Pacman music/sprites/etc... - Bandai Namco Entertainment
  • Photos - IBM

    • Please Stay - Jim Hall (license)
    • They Mostly Come Out at Night - Jim Hall (license)

    • sonDanielson <-Check out lots of free assets!
    • sonDanielson's free to use Gameboy Style RPG tileset which was used in this game can be found here: https://sondanielson.itch.io/gameboy-simple-rpg-tileset
